message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob.  Think about how much the money will be worth if we wait too long!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a fair deal that gives us both a decent share.  We shouldn't let this drag on.
Bob, my offer is still the best way to maximize our gains. Every round we wait costs us money! Let's be smart and end this here.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm compromising again, but this really needs to be the last round. Take it or leave it.
